sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import useGlobalContext from "../../Global"; import {ReactComponent as Logo} from "../../assets/logo.svg" import {ReactComponent as SearchIcon} from "../../assets/search.svg" import {ReactComponent as UserIcon} from "../../assets/user.svg" import {ReactComponent as CartIcon} from "../../assets/cart.svg" import {ReactComponent as MenuIcon} from "../../assets/icon-menu.svg" import * as S from "./styles" export default function Header() { const { amount } = useGlobalContext() let showMobileMenuItems = true const mobileMenuToggle = () => { console.log('antes: ' + showMobileMenuItems) showMobileMenuItems = !showMobileMenuItems console.log('depois: ' + showMobileMenuItems) } return ( Minha Conta Minha Conta {amount} ) }
